body: Is there, or can there be an Avicus forum API? I think it would be great fun to play around and try to make a mobile client / app for the forums. So is this possible?
body_tagged: Is there, or can there be an Avicus forum API? I think it would be great fun to play around and try to make a mobile client / app for the forums. So is this possible?
title: Forum API?

replies.body: Planning on adding one in the future.
replies.body_tagged: Planning on adding one in the future.

replies.body: A Stats API will be great too <:
replies.body_tagged: A Stats API will be great too <:

replies.body: There would be a profiles API that allows for retrieving stats if possible.
replies.body_tagged: There would be a profiles API that allows for retrieving stats if possible.

replies.body: CaptainDCRaven had written a java program to collect whole teams stats and give the teams average time played, total kills etc... now he had to restart
